topic.title: Showing basic gherkin syntax
topic.shortdesc:
In order to see that gherkin is a very simple langauge As a SpecFlow evangelist I want to show that basic syntax
![Test Image](test.jpg)

section.title: Simple GWT
section.p: Given the initial state of the application is Running
When I ask what the application state is
Then I should see Running as the answer

section.title: Using And and But
section.p: Given the initial state of the application is Running
And I have authorization to ask application state
When I ask what the application state is
Then I should see Running as the answer
And I should see the time of the application
But the state of the application should not be Stopped
